job.title: Account Executive
job.experience: You have 3+ years consultative B2B enterprise sales experience, with prior training in sales fundamentals
job.descriptionhtml:
We believe that finding the right team member, which means we’re less concerned about what your resume looks like, than how our conversation goes. While qualifications matter (see below), here are some of the things about your personality that we care about:

You are scrappy and resourceful. You are responsible and have integrity.  This isn’t typically a resume line-item, but it’s very important and we will want to speak to your former colleagues.

You are confident.  Since you’re an early employee you will need to be a leader, by definition.  We want you to believe and aspire to shaping what our company does.

**You don’t mind doing everything. And anything. Building a startup looks glamorous. Until it doesn’t. We need someone who doesn’t think twice about rolling up their sleeves and getting messy.

Please note that if you are interested in the position, kindly complete this short Hiring Assessment:   **https://www.ondemandassessment.com/link/index/JB-2RY0F48GD?u=1007465

Requirements:

  • You are independent, self-directed and have high standards. 
  • You have 3+ years consultative B2B enterprise sales experience, with prior training in sales fundamentals
  • You are a highly consultative seller, an active listener, and leave your ego at the door. 
  • You are passionate about gender equality and making the workplace more inclusive. 

  • You are flexible, work well with others, and can contribute to the Fairygodboss team and mission.

Perks:

  • Unlimited PTO!
  • Great Medical/Dental/Vision Insurance via Aetna
  • 401k contributions through Slavic
  • Commuter Benefits via ConnectYourCare
  • Short Term/Long Term Disability Insurance
  • Voluntary Life Insurance
  • Equity Options for all employees!
  • Uncapped commission
